abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center at Kaplan Penthouse.
lead_paragraph: Musicians explored a range of emotions in a program of five contemporary works at the Kaplan Penthouse at Lincoln Center.

headline.main: Review: Chamber Music Society, From Mirth to Mortality
